title.native: わんだふるぷりきゅあ！

description:
The 21st installment in the Precure series.

Animal Town is a town where animals and people live together. Iroha loves animals and is good friends with her dog, Komugi! One day, a mysterious creature, Garugaru, wreaks havoc in the town! However, in order to protect Iroha, Komugi transformed into human form and became a Precure...! I have to save the child animal whose heart is being garugaru-ed...! Let's join forces and return the animals to Niko Garden!

(Source: Crunchyroll News)
hashtag: #わんだふるぷりきゅあ #わんプリ

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Kids
tags.description: Target demographic is young children.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Tokusatsu
tags.description: Prominently features elements that resemble special effects in Japanese live-action shows

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Environmental
tags.description: Concern with the state of the natural world and how humans interact with it.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Primarily Animal Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed animal or animal-like characters.

tags.name: Superhero
tags.description: Prominently features super-powered humans who aim to serve the greater good.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Veterinarian
tags.description: Prominently features a veterinarian or one of the main characters is a veterinarian.

tags.name: Coastal
tags.description: Story prominently takes place near the beach or around a coastal area/town. Setting is near the ocean.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Makeup
tags.description: Centers around the makeup industry.

tags.name: Creature Taming
tags.description: Features the taming of animals, monsters, or other creatures.

tags.name: Dinosaurs
tags.description: Prominently features Dinosaurs, prehistoric reptiles that went extinct millions of years ago.

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/東堂いづみ) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Izumi_Todo)

Izumi Toudou is a collective pseudonym for [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/)'s staff.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/NaSka_Style) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/naska_style/) | [Tumblr](https://naska-style.tumblr.com/)

Costume/clothing designer and plush toy creator.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/NaSka_Style) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/naska_style/) | [Tumblr](https://naska-style.tumblr.com/)

Costume/clothing designer and plush toy creator.

[Official Site](https://erika-fukasawa.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Fukaeri_Comp) 

**Erika Fukasawa** is a Japanese composer and arranger.
__[Website](https://firstcallmusic.net/artist/effy/)__ | __Twitter__ Effy (real name Kousuke Moribe) is a producer, composer, arranger and keyboardist afilliated with FirstCall.
__[Website](https://firstcallmusic.net/artist/effy/)__ | __Twitter__ Effy (real name Kousuke Moribe) is a producer, composer, arranger and keyboardist afilliated with FirstCall.

[Wiki (JP)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/マイクスギヤマ)

Mike Sugiyama is a Japanese lyricist, composer and arranger for anime. His real name is Sugiyama Akihiko (杉山昭彦).

__[Website](http://higedriver.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/higedriver)__

Hige Driver, alternatively known as Shingo, is a Japanese vocalist, guitarist, lyricist, composer, arranger and member of HigedriveVAN. He is affiliated with the creator team [Heart's Cry](https://anilist.co/staff/252231/).

On August 10th, 2020, his marriage to voice actress [Ari Ozawa](https://anilist.co/staff/118663) was announced.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/NaSka_Style) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/naska_style/) | [Tumblr](https://naska-style.tumblr.com/)

Costume/clothing designer and plush toy creator.
